name: Keep moving and nobody explodes
description:
You have been chosen! Now you are in charge of transporting a dangerous chemical and locking it in a safe. It is in an unstable state so be careful, as soon as you stop moving a powerful reaction starts. It may help you remove obstacles on your way, but also leads to an explosion in case you stay still for too long. Do we trust you with this because of your skill or because you are replaceable? Well, it's time to put on your hazmat suit and prove yourself!

 

Controls: WASD / arrow keys + space

This game was created by Alberto Guidice and Eszter Várhidi in about one day for Ludum Dare 49 with the theme Unstable.
